SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

oracle.apps.saf.ta.jaudit.core.annotations
Annotation Type RuleResources

@Target(value=FIELD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface RuleResources

Provides label values for a SafRule instance. Message variants for violations may be returned by invoking the proper reportMessage method on the ViolationReportFacade as appropriate.

See Also:
SafRule, ViolationReportFacade

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.String description
          The rule description to be shown in JDeveloper.
 java.lang.String label
          The rule label.
 java.lang.String message
          The default violation message.
 
Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.String gsccStandard
          The gscc standard name which will be appended as a valid Gscc link in the description().
 java.lang.String message2
          Optional additional message variant for a violation.
 java.lang.String message3
          Optional additional message variant for a violation.
 java.lang.String message4
          Optional additional message variant for a violation.
 java.lang.String message5
          Optional additional message variant for a violation.
